about_the_game:
Build your deck. Choose your path. Tame the untamable.

Step into a world where myths and legends collide in this roguelike deckbuilder, blending strategic combat, squad management, and monster taming. Assemble a team of iconic Heroes Rogues and mythical Beasts as you carve your path through a procedurally generated world filled with choices and challenges.

  • 15 Rogues, in 4 different classes, with different passives each.

  • 5 Beasts, with 25 unique evolutions.

  • 20 synergy abilities, with 2-3 levels each.

  • 50 items to help you in your journey.

  • Different terrains, with unique abilities and effects that alter the course of the battle!

  • Recruit heroes Rogues like Dante, Gilgamesh, and Fadhma Nsoumer, each with unique powers and decks.

  • Build teams that trigger powerful synergy abilities.

  • Combine Rogues with mythical Beasts for endlessly diverse strategies.

  • Encounter and tame mythical creatures like the shapeshifting Kambaltou and the flying Griffin.

  • Train beasts to unlock new powers and forms as they evolve during your journey.

  • Use their abilities strategically to complement your deck.

  • Unlock synergy abilities by assembling Rogues & Beasts with thematic history or complementary personality.

  • With the right team composition, you can amplify your damage, enhance all the shields, or even trigger powerful debuffs.

  • Experiment with countless team combinations for unique playstyles.

  • Fight in dynamic environments where the terrain shapes the battle.

  • The Lost Desert Lands drain health for non-Nomad characters, while The Ancient Cathedral reduces armor for non-Beasts.

  • Adjust tactics based on the environment or risk being overwhelmed.

Will you harness the bond between the Beasts & Rogues to shape the fate of Earth?
